alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 7:26PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Ada, southwestern Boise and southern Gem Counties through 815 PM MDT... At 725 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southern Boise, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and torrential rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rain could cause minor flooding and ponding on roadways. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Boise and Garden City around 730 PM MDT. Eagle and Hidden Springs around 740 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
